author: minchau
msg: Patch was modified slightly and approved by Brian Minchau.
The fix lets users set the "enable-inlining" feature specifically
where the default value in Stylesheet class was wreaking havoc.

author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixes TAPESTRY-1762.  Shouldn't have been adding in document scroll to timepicker x/y coords.

author: byersa
msg: I felt that there was a need to show that a content was "available" instead of in progress, draft, etc.
If a content gets published, then deactivated, but is available for republishing - that is the scenario i had in mind.
